tool.name: Remove Description
tool.help:
**What it does**
Removes the "description" from fasta sequences. Some tools (glimmer/genemarks) do not behave correctly regarding these descriptions, so this tool strips that data out with no way to re-add it.
The fasta ID is everything from the ``>`` to the first space, the description is everything after the first space.
**Example Input/Outputs**
For an input sequence like::
>1|random sequence|A: 0.25|C: 0.25|G: 0.25|T: 0.25|length: 288 bp acttacgcggagagatgagaccaacgctcgcctaggggcacgcttgtaattgacttatct >2|random sequence|A: 0.25|C: 0.25|G: 0.25|T: 0.25|length: 232 bp gttggggacccacctatcagggagtgtagtagtataagactgtccaataccccccaacat
This tool will remove the descriptions and leave you with just the Fasta IDs::
>1|random acttacgcggagagatgagaccaacgctcgcctaggggcacgcttgtaattgacttatct >2|random gttggggacccacctatcagggagtgtagtagtataagactgtccaataccccccaacat
